snippet: Many states, and their crops, saw very little rain from Hurricane Isaac’s remnants.
abstract: Several states in the Central Plains remain under drought conditions, despite the relief that Hurricane Isaac brought to many areas, with conditions worsening in rain-starved region stretching from South Dakota to northern Texas.
lead_paragraph: Many states, and their crops, saw very little rain from Hurricane Isaac’s remnants.

headline.seo: Large Swath of U.S. Remains Parched Despite Storm
headline.main: Wide Area of Nation Still Parched After Storm
headline.print_headline: Wide Area Of Nation Still Parched After Storm
